text: beth_greene He 's clueless . He had us waiting for a cure .
maggie_greene He knows he was wrong .
shane_walsh I thought we were going further .
rick_grimes We are . 18 miles out .
shane_walsh So why are we stopping ?
rick_grimes I wanted to talk . Been waiting a week till we were gon na do this . I just wanna talk .
shane_walsh We do n't need to .
rick_grimes We do .
shane_walsh No man , we do n't . We 're doing this . I get it . He was passed out when y' all brought him here , does n't know where the farm is .
rick_grimes That is n't what I need to talk to you about . I heard what really happened at the school .
rick_grimes Was it to survive ?
shane_walsh Yeah . One of us was n't gon na make it out . It had to be him . One shot to the leg , Carl lives . Reality is he had no business being here -- there . Whatever .
rick_grimes You do n't think I would 've done it ?
shane_walsh No , man , I know you would n't have .
rick_grimes You do n't think I can keep lori or Carl safe ?
shane_walsh I did n't say that .
rick_grimes Or my baby ? Is it gon na have to be me too ?
shane_walsh Rick , you ca n't just be the good guy and expect to live . Okay ? Not anymore .

rick_grimes I 'm not the good guy anymore . To save Carl 's life , I would 've done anything . Anything . Now lori says your dangerous , but you 're not gon na be dangerous . Not to us , not to me , not anymore . How about you look at me ? You and Lori -- I get what happened . When I figured it out -- and I figured it out pretty quickly -- I wanted to break your jaw , let you choke on your teeth . But I did n't . That was n't weakness . It took everything . That is my wife . That is my son . That is my unborn child . I will stay alive to keep them alive . You do n't love her . You think you do , but you do n't . Now the only way you and me keep on is that you accept everything I just said right here , right now , and we move forward with that understanding .

shane_walsh When it started it was just -- it was a couple of weird stories on the news . Then -- then it was so quick . Everything -- it just happened . Two weeks later I 'm in the hospital and there were soldiers shooting people in the halls . They were shooting people , man , not walkers . Then the walkers came through . You know , I tried to get you out , I tried , but we were n't gon na make it . Man , there was no way and I knew it . But I could n't live with it . I could n't live , knowing-- but I had to . I did n't keep lori and Carl alive , man . They kept me alive . I want you to know that I did n't look at her before that . Brother , if I could take it all back , I would .
rick_grimes I wanna check the ropes .
randall_culver It 's all good .
maggie_greene rick say anything to you about Glenn when they got back from town ?
lori_grimes Just that it had gotten pretty bad .
maggie_greene He 's not the same .
maggie_greene Says he froze . Blames me . Says I got inside his head .

lori_grimes He came back -- that 's what matters . Men have to do certain things -- you know that -- and they 're either gon na blame the little woman as the reason they do 'em or the reason they do n't . I 'll tell you something -- what happens out there happens out there . And we -- we're just trying to keep it together till they get back .
maggie_greene Thing 's were good . Maybe I-- .

lori_grimes Glenn 's a big boy . He makes his own choices , and then you -- do you have anything to apologize for ? Tell him to man up and pull himself together . Just do n't say """" man up . """" It never goes well .
maggie_greene Let me just get this to beth .
lori_grimes You go on . I got it .
rick_grimes We 've got ta start using our knives more . If there 's one walker , we use our knives . We keep things quiet . We save ammunition .
shane_walsh Yeah .

rick_grimes We need dry goods ahead of the winter -- warm clothes . fuel . Maybe we get a break . You got ta think the cold affects them . If it does n't kill 'em , it 's got ta slow 'em down . The second week of January last year , we got all that snow and ice . My cousin got stuck on 85 for 24 hours . Sitting in his car with a birthday cake for his girlfriend at Georgia Tech . He just sat and ate birthday cake and listened to the """" Lord Of The Rings """" book on tape . Twice . We get lucky , we get the same winter as last year . By December , it 's a different world . Safer . Maybe we find some snowmobiles to make runs .
shane_walsh That sounds good .
lori_grimes Knock knock . How about this -- you , uh -- you eat up all your food , we 'll get you up and out of here and go take a walk . What do you say ? It 'll do good to be outside .
beth_greene You 're pregnant . How could you do that ?
lori_grimes Uh , I do n't really have a choice .
beth_greene You think it 'll make a difference ?
lori_grimes Of course it will . You eat something .
shane_walsh It 's more than 18 .
rick_grimes Yeah , I 'm looking for a place .
shane_walsh A place for what ?
rick_grimes Give him a fair shake . A shot . There .
rick_grimes This'll do . We 'll leave the boy here and scavenge some supplies . Over there .
rick_grimes Wait . Like I said .
rick_grimes Gun 's quick , easy , but other ways to do this .
rick_grimes One more . Your turn .
shane_walsh Hey , rick .
shane_walsh I do n't see any bites .
rick_grimes Got ta be scratches then -- this one 's hand , other one 's cheek . They had walkers here -- burned bodies down the hill .
shane_walsh I guess it got ta be scratches then , huh ?
lori_grimes Could n't eat a thing , huh ? You 're gonna-- .
lori_grimes Hey . I know how hard it is . I tried for days to reach my mom , get her on the phone . I can only assume-- .
beth_greene It 's just so pointless .

lori_grimes Oh . You have Maggie , your father , Patricia & amp ; Jimmy . And you 've got ta stay strong for them . I wish I could promise you it would be all right in the end . I ca n't , but we can make now all right . And we have to .
beth_greene Thank you .
lori_grimes I 'll be right back . We 'll go take that walk .
lori_grimes Beth ? You give it to me , sweetheart . You do n't wanna do this .
lori_grimes Andrea , have you seen maggie or Hershel ?
andrea_harrison I have n't seen Hershel , but I saw maggie and Glenn walk by maybe 20 minutes ago .
lori_grimes Could you find her for me ? I 've got ta get back to the house .
andrea_harrison Of course .
randall_culver Sorry . Oh . The hell is this ?

randall_culver Oh , come on , do n't be stupid . I owe you guys . I can help protect what you 've got . Why would you save my life just to kill me by leaving me here ? One guy -- one guy ca n't make it alone . That 's why I was with those dudes -- I was alone . Do n't be stupid ! I 'm not like them ! I 'm just some guy I used to watch football and screw around on the internet . I lived with my mom ! I lost her like you lost people . I went to school with maggie for god 's sake ! I went to church . I rode the bench on varsity baseball .
rick_grimes You went to school with Maggie ?
shane_walsh You go to school with Maggie ? Answer the question ! Did you go to school with Maggie ?
randall_culver I -- it -- she did n't know me . Did n't even know I existed . I mean I knew her . I knew who her dad was . There is no way I would ever do anything to hurt her or her family .
shane_walsh Jesus .
randall_culver Or you or your people . I 'm not like the guys I was with !
shane_walsh He knows where the farm is , Rick . Where we are . He knows . Say he finds his way back to his people . Shane , no !
rick_grimes Not now . Just not now .
shane_walsh Well , when , Rick ? When ?
rick_grimes When I 've had a chance to think about it .
randall_culver Do n't let him kill me . Please do n't .
rick_grimes Shut up ! We 're going back . It 's a man 's life . I need a night to think it through .

shane_walsh You 're gon na bring this piece of garbage -- this piece of garbage who -- he shot at you , Rick . He ran with men who tried to kill you . You gon na bring him back to where lori sleeps ? To where Carl sleeps ?
rick_grimes He 'll be locked up in the barn , unless you bust it open .
shane_walsh Oh , do n't start that shit .
rick_grimes I 'm taking the night .

shane_walsh Man , you take that -- you think on it , Rick . Keep struggling with it . It ai n't hard , man . The right choice is the one that keeps us alive . It 's always the same with you . It 's like the first moment -- it 's whenever you 're put to the test .
rick_grimes Stop acting like you know the way ahead , like you know the rules . There are no rules , man . We 're lost .
shane_walsh No no no , man . I know exactly where I am .
rick_grimes You do n't know shit anymore .
shane_walsh I do n't think you can do it , rick .
rick_grimes It 's my call , man .
shane_walsh I do n't think you can keep them safe .
rick_grimes Ah !
rick_grimes Damn ! God ! No !
shane_walsh Get off me , man .
rick_grimes You 're not doing this ! You do n't get to make these calls anymore .
rick_grimes I wo n't let you .
maggie_greene Are you crazy ? What if dad finds out ?
beth_greene What 's he gon na do ? Kill me for committing suicide ?
maggie_greene Stop being such a brat . He 'd die . So would I. This is n't just about you . We all lost mom .
beth_greene We 'll lose each other and I could n't stand that .
maggie_greene So you give up ?
randall_culver Come on , bitch . Let 's see what you got .
andrea_harrison Where 's Hershel ?
lori_grimes He does n't want to find out yet . It 's a family affair . We 'll let them work it out .
andrea_harrison That 's working it out ?
lori_grimes When beth stops fighting , that 's when it 's time to worry .
maggie_greene You are being so selfish !
andrea_harrison This could 've been handled better .
lori_grimes How so ?
andrea_harrison You should n't have taken the knife away .
lori_grimes Excuse me ?
andrea_harrison You were wrong , like Dale taking my gun . That was n't your decision . She has to choose to live on her own . She has to find her own reasons .
lori_grimes Want me to tie a noose for her ?
andrea_harrison If she 's serious , she 'll figure out a way .
lori_grimes Does n't mean I ca n't stop her or let her know that I care .
andrea_harrison That has nothing to do with it , Lori . She only has so many choices in front of her , and she believes the best one is suicide .
lori_grimes That 's not an option .
andrea_harrison Of course it is . She does n't need to be yelled at or treated like a child .
lori_grimes She needs a loaded gun , right ? You 'll understand if I do n't send you in there .
andrea_harrison I came through it .
lori_grimes And became such a productive member of the group . Let maggie handle this her way .
andrea_harrison I contribute . I help keep this place safe .
lori_grimes The men can handle this on their own . They do n't need your help .
andrea_harrison I 'm sorry . What would you have me do ?
lori_grimes Oh , there 's plenty of work to go around .
andrea_harrison Are you serious ? Everything falls apart , you 're in my face over skipping laundry ?

lori_grimes Puts a burden on the rest of us , on me , Carol , Patricia and Maggie . Cooking , cleaning and caring for Beth . And you -- you do n't care about anyone but yourself . You sit up on that RV , working on your tan with a shotgun in your lap .
andrea_harrison No , I am on watch against walkers . That is what matters , not fresh mint leaves in the lemonade .
lori_grimes And we are providing stability . We are trying to create a life worth living .
andrea_harrison Are you kidding me ?
lori_grimes Look , I went after Rick . I took down two walkers .
andrea_harrison After crashing Maggie 's car .
lori_grimes Do n't act like you 're the only one who can take care of herself .
andrea_harrison Ever apologize for that ?
lori_grimes Crashing her -- you're insane .
andrea_harrison No , you are . And you 're the one that 's self - centered , the way you take it all for granted .
lori_grimes My husband is out there for the hundredth time . My son was shot . Do n't you dare tell me I take this for granted .

andrea_harrison You do n't get it , do you ? Your husband came back from the dead , your son too . And now you 've got a baby on the way . The rest of us have piled up our losses -- me , Carol , Beth -- but you just keep on keeping on .
lori_grimes We have all suffered .

andrea_harrison Playing house , acting like the queen bee , laying down rules for everybody but yourself . You know what ? Go ahead . Go in there and tell that little girl that everything 's gon na be okay , just like it is for you . She 'll get a husband , a son , baby , boyfriend . She just has to look on the bright side .
maggie_greene Mom would be ashamed to learn she raised such a coward . What about dad , Beth ?
beth_greene When has dad ever admitted he was wrong ? He 's just telling Rick 's group what they want to here .
maggie_greene And Jimmy ?
beth_greene We went out for three months and now I 'm married to him ?
maggie_greene And me ? You could do that to me ? I ca n't take another funeral .
beth_greene You ca n't avoid it . What are we waiting for ? We should both do it .
maggie_greene What ?
beth_greene At the same time . Help each other .
maggie_greene No .
beth_greene It 's hard to do it . No wants wants to but-- .
maggie_greene No , please do n't .
beth_greene We can do it so it 's peaceful , easy .
maggie_greene Stop talking like that .
beth_greene Our choice , and then it would be over . Or we 'll be forced to do it when the farm and this house is overrun . No one can protect us .
maggie_greene That 's not true .

beth_greene Who , Glenn ? I heard what happened . rick will save his family , the others too . We 're alone . You , me , Patricia , with only dad and Jimmy against a whole world of those things . I do n't wanna be gutted . I wanna go in this bed tonight with you beside me . Please .
shane_walsh Okay . You want some of that ?
shane_walsh Oh shit .
maggie_greene Oh . Hey .
andrea_harrison You ca n't sit on top of her .
maggie_greene I ca n't leave her by herself .
andrea_harrison You 're gon na have to . You 're exhausted . Go get some air . I 'll sit with her . Go ahead . Wash up , get something to eat . I got it .
maggie_greene Okay . Okay . Thanks .
andrea_harrison Okay .
beth_greene Are n't you gon na say something ?
andrea_harrison Is this what you want ? The pain does n't go away . You just make room for it .
rick_grimes Oh !
randall_culver Holy shit .
rick_grimes Where the hell do you think you 're going ?
randall_culver What did you expect me to do ? Please , just let me go , man . That 's what you came here for . I 'm not gon na tell anyone anything .
rick_grimes Shut up .

randall_culver You wanna stay here ? Help the guy that just bash your head in ? There 's 10 roamers there . You think you can take them on ? They do n't see us . We can get out of here . Oh , come on . Fine ! But let me have a gun . I 'll help you . I 'll show you . I can . I know it .
rick_grimes Let 's go .
randall_culver What ?
rick_grimes He did this . We 're going .
randall_culver Oh , thank you . Thank you .
shane_walsh Rick . No , man . Come back , man .
maggie_greene Beth ?
maggie_greene Beth ? Beth ?
lori_grimes Maggie ?
maggie_greene She 's in there . I heard glass .
lori_grimes Beth , you all right ?
maggie_greene Do n't do this , Beth . Do n't do this . Open up , please .
maggie_greene God , I left her with andrea .
lori_grimes Where 's a key ?
maggie_greene I do n't know . beth honey , please open the door . I 'm not mad . I 'm not mad , beth .
lori_grimes Maggie . Hang on .
beth_greene I 'm sorry .
maggie_greene Okay . It 's okay .
rick_grimes Stay there .
shane_walsh Yeah , you like that ?
rick_grimes Shane !
rick_grimes Shane ! Go for the back door ! Come on ! Come on , get in ! Go , man , go ! Come on !
randall_culver Whoo ! Yeah ! Hell yeah ! You see that ? You see what we did ?
rick_grimes Just keep driving .
maggie_greene Where were you ?
andrea_harrison I heard . Is she all right ?
maggie_greene She would be if you had stayed with her . Where were you ?
andrea_harrison How bad is she ?
lori_grimes It was n't deep .
andrea_harrison She wants to live . She made her decision .
maggie_greene She tried to kill herself .
andrea_harrison No , she did n't .
maggie_greene My father is stitching her wrist right now .
andrea_harrison She 'll live .
maggie_greene Stay away from her . From both of us . Do n't you dare step foot inside this house again .
lori_grimes I 'm not gon na say she was right , but beth has made her choice . She want to live and now she knows it . And sometimes you have to cross the line .
maggie_greene Mmm .

rick_grimes If you wanna kill me , you 're gon na have to do better than a wrench . Probably gon na have to kill that boy , but I am gon na think about it a night . It ca n't be that easy , killing someone , killing anyone . You know that . That is my wife . That is my son . That is my child . If you 're gon na be with us , you got ta follow my lead , you got ta trust me . It 's time for you to come back ' I am nothing ' ' Without pretend ' ' I know my thoughts ' ' Ca n't live with them ' ' I am nothing ' ' Without a man ' ' I know my thoughts ' ' But I ca n't hide them ' ' I do n't need another friend ' ' When most of them ' ' I can barely keep up with them ' ' Perfectly able to hold my own hair ' ' But I still . '
